review: Dr. Divij is really professional, ************** and has a super friendly demeanour. He carefully examined my complaint and explained to me the whole thing with impressive clarity.

Doctor made a fair assessment and advised on the correct course of action even though I just needed an x-ray to establish that I needed no treatment. For me as a concerned patient it was a great relief.

I came from Los Angeles looking for a good doctor in New Delhi, and I'm glad I found Dr. Divij and Dr. Ashna Khanna. They are the most professional dentists I've ever met, and their facility is spotless. I wish I could give them 10 stars! Great job guys!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had first visited for my infected tooth which i had got Root Canal and capping done sometime back. Dr. Divij was very kind to explain the issue briefly and then advised me the procedure and cost. My tooth condition was really bad, he had also arranged a visiting doctor who was a specialist , to operate my tooth. He made sure that he is also available at odd hours to answer my queries, as i was in unbearable pain for days. I am really glad that now this tooth is fine and he suggested ways to take care of the dental cavity. Would suggest and recommend him for sure. 5/5 rating

I highly recommend my dentist for the exceptional root implant procedure. Their expertise and meticulous approach made the entire process smooth and efficient. As an NRI, I visited the doctor with my concerns, and he provided me with long-term solutions for each step. The treatment was smooth. I definitely recommend him if you are an NRI. Thanks!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Surgery,
review:
Excellent overall 
I’m very grateful for the treatment and being in such excellence care 
Dr divij Khanna and Dr Ashana Khanna 
And all the staff 
My implants and all the other stuff done for my dental implants was just great 
I have no issues till today 
Thank You To Dr Divij Khanna n Dr Ashana Khanna

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Khanna did a great job of identifying a post procedure issue from an extraction treatment at another clinic and quickly rectified it without having to resort to more invasive means like surgery.
He put me at ease with his mannerism, thorough explanation and most of all his expert handling of relieving the discomfort and pain I was feeling without knowing my history.
He is an excellent Doctor.
Highly recommended.
